# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  exclude tags multi_temperature_statement.cir.hspice multi_temperature_statement.cir multi_temperature_statement.cir.sh single_temperature_statement.cir.hspice single_temperature_statement.cir single_temperature_statement.cir.sh tnom_default_setting.cir.hspice tnom_default_setting.cir tnom_default_setting.cir.sh tnom_option_setting.cir.hspice tnom_option_setting.cir tnom_option_setting.cir.sh DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/multi_temperature_statement.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/single_temperature_statement.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tnom_default_setting.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tnom_option_setting.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND XDM_BDL_FOUND AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}XDM/HSPICE/TEMPERATURE/multi_temperature_statement.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} multi_temperature_statement.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} multi_temperature_statement.cir ${OutputDataDir}/XDM/HSPICE/TEMPERATURE/multi_temperature_statement.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}XDM/HSPICE/TEMPERATURE/multi_temperature_statement.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;required:xdm;hspice")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND XDM_BDL_FOUND AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}XDM/HSPICE/TEMPERATURE/single_temperature_statement.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} single_temperature_statement.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} single_temperature_statement.cir ${OutputDataDir}/XDM/HSPICE/TEMPERATURE/single_temperature_statement.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}XDM/HSPICE/TEMPERATURE/single_temperature_statement.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;required:xdm;hspice")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND XDM_BDL_FOUND AND PERL_FOUND )

endif()
